proc fillText(target: Image | Mask; font: Font; text: string;
              transform: Vec2 | Mat3 = vec2(0, 0); bounds = vec2(0, 0);
              hAlign = haLeft; vAlign = vaTop) {...}{.inline.}
Typesets and fills the text. Optional parameters: transform: translation or matrix to apply bounds: width determines wrapping and hAlign, height for vAlign hAlign: horizontal alignment of the text vAlign: vertical alignment of the text
